attributes.action: Create more parking spaces for locals in the street
attributes.additional_details: Lack of parking spaces is causing us too park on the grass which is not good for the grass and the trees and the roots are now becoming visible due to cars being parked on them,cars are being parked pretty much in the middle of the road which can be a big issue if emergency vehicles need to get through, mud is being trailed onto the road and paths which can be a slip hazard or obstruction for the public who is passing, all it will take is one visit from the council and they will be able to tell that’s it’s an issue, there’s been a few times where I personally have had to park outside my street for the poor parking
attributes.background: Currently the parking in our street is a disgrace, we need more parking spaces to be put in for us to use as we are currently parking on the grass
